name: L'industrie Pizzeria
description: Celebrated locale turning out classic old-world pies & slices, plus inventive flavor combinations.

name: St. Anselm
description: Steaks & grilled seafood are the specialty of this unassuming, brick-walled spot.

name: Pepolino
description: Easygoing, bi-level restaurant with outdoor seating serving modern Tuscan dishes & Italian wines.

name: Fiaschetteria Pistoia
description: Pastas, prosciutto & other Tuscan dishes are paired with Italian wines at this intimate eatery.

name: Lillia
description: In a redone auto-body shop, this Italian place offers wood-fired Italian fare & housemade pastas.

name: Hibino
description: Sushi, small plates & housemade tofu are on the menu at this creative, quiet Japanese restaurant.

name: Fish Cheeks
description: Eatery by chef-brothers from Thailand for shareable Thai seafood plates with cocktails.

name: Soothr
description: Intimate space with al fresco dining offering Thai noodles & soups, plus cocktails.

name: Dunwell Doughnuts
description: All-vegan donut shop with a rotating list of 200 varieties, plus ice cream & French-press coffee.

name: Fan Fan Doughnuts
description: Artisanal donuts are baked on-site in small batches at this classic shop, which offers coffee & tea.

name: Oxomoco
description: Airy Mexican eatery offering wood-fired dishes plus ample tequila & mezcal cocktails & a patio.

name: Nura
description: Brooklyn restaurant serving Indian-accented New American fare and thoughtful wine & cocktails in a lively setting

name: Crown Shy
description: Polished, new American restaurant with global influences inside spacious room with high ceilings.
address: 70 Pine Street Ground Floor, New York, NY 10005

name: Arepera Guacuco
description: This family-run Venezuelan eatery serves arepas, empanadas & exotic juices in a no-frills setting.

name: The Woo
description: Modern Korean eatery specializing in barbecue & mains with exposed brick walls & beamed ceilings.

name: Ali's Roti Shop
description: Bare-bones restaurant serving traditional Caribbean eats, like roti bread made from fresh dough.

name: C & Y
description: Small quaint chinese food in park slope.

name: La Bellezza
description: Cozy pizzeria frequented by locals for their chicken parm hero.

name: Masti
description: Classic Indian dishes are served at this casual, elegantly decorated venue with a tandoor oven.

name: Sylvia's
description: Harlem landmark serving generous helpings of Southern comfort food since 1962.
address: 328 Malcolm X Blvd, New York, NY 10027

name: Sam's Fried Ice Cream
description: No-frills counter offering deep-fried ice cream desserts with custom flavors & crust options.

name: Spot Dessert Bar
description: The sweets combine Asian & American flavors at this St. Marks Place dessert cafe.
address: The sweets combine Asian & American flavors at this St. Marks Place dessert cafe.

name: Mikey Likes It Ice Cream
description: Small, minimalist ice cream shop dishing up organic, creative flavors with pop-culture influences.

name: Morgenstern's Finest Ice Cream
description: Flagship location of an artisanal ice cream shop with expanded menu of sweet treats plus cocktails.
address: 88 W Houston St, New York, NY 10012
